users.about:
Nimble Learn

*Founder & Principal Business Intelligence (BI) Consultant*

Michael has a *BSc (Hons) Information Systems* degree and is a *Microsoft Certified Professional*. He is an active Microsoft TechNet community member, helps to moderate the Power Pivot forum​, has received Microsoft TechNet awards relating to Power​ BI, and is a *Microsoft Azure Platform Advisor*. Michael has over seven years of experience designing, developing, and supporting complex Information Management and Data Warehouse/Business Intelligence solutions across a number of industry sectors (including Health Care, Financial Services, Media Investments, Retail, and Transportation). He possesses advanced skills and knowledge relating to Dimensional Modelling, Data Warehousing, Microsoft enterprise and self-service Business Intelligence (on-premise and cloud-based), big data analytics, and data visualisation.
users.name: michaelamadi
